properties.description: Create Credential to use Azure Synapse Link for Cosmos DB

content.query:
CREATE CREDENTIAL [franmeracccosmos] 
WITH IDENTITY = 'SHARED ACCESS SIGNATURE', SECRET = 'qauTghR2JPfjJ6NeoNHBDOgn0ey0o1Walzs2QH9T9a4able8VdKAkiQAQh0emM11axhJwmttFFELGCVIZSlSRQ=='



SELECT TOP 100 *
FROM OPENROWSET(â€‹PROVIDER = 'CosmosDB',
                CONNECTION = 'Account=franmeracccosmos;Database=CosmosDemoDB',
                OBJECT = 'Products',
                SERVER_CREDENTIAL = 'franmeracccosmos'
) AS [Products]
